release.action: StripesMagnoliaFilter was leaking open jcr sessions
Stripes renderer updated to set magnolia 4.0 implicit objects by default (actpage, content...)
Fixed "post not supported error" with stripes 1.5.1
i18n basename for paragraphs can now be set using the /modules/stripes/config/i18nbasename property
port to magnolia 4.0 (created the branch "openutils-mgnlstripes-3.6.x" to continue supporting magnolia 3.6.x integration)
support for stripes 1.5 (note: it only works with 1.5, not 1.4.x anymore)
the stripes filter is now added by the module automatically, and it should not be added anymore in web.xml
multipart forms are now handled properly

Added support for indexed parameters by replacing "{}" with "[]" in parameter names (hack). With Stripes you can use indexed parameters, but square brakets are not allowed in jcr node names and can't be used in paragraph attributes. You can now use "list{1}" in attribute names for that.
Excluded commons-logging dependency from stripes in pom.xml. Magnolia already imports jcl104-over-slf4j, which is a replacement over the standard commons-logging jar.
Initial release with support for stripes paragraphs.
